channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Roku Streaming Stick Plus Review: Cheap, Simple, and Pretty
item.description: This cheap little dongle is the perfect way to get better apps on your smart TV.

item.title: The 8 Best Home Arcade Machines (2025), Tested and Reviewed
item.description: Rewind to the classic games of the ‘70s and ‘80s with a WIRED-tested home arcade machine.

item.title: YouTube adds an AI Overviews-like search results carousel
item.description: YouTube is rolling out new AI-powered features to help users find content and information more easily, the company announced on Thursday.

item.title: Jon McNeill brings the operator’s playbook to TechCrunch All Stage
item.description: Founders are often told to chase product-market fit before anything else, but what if scaling too soon, too fast, is what’s really holding them back? ...

item.title: 6 Best Phones With Headphone Jacks (2025): Tested and Reviewed
item.description: Headphone jacks are endangered, but they’re not gone. Here are our favorite smartphones that still let you plug and play.

item.title: Anthros Chair V2 Review: Surprisingly Great
item.description: This might be the most supportive office chair I've ever sat on.

item.title: People use AI for companionship much less than we’re led to think
item.description: A report by Anthropic reveals that people rarely seek companionship from AI, and turn to AI for emotional support or advice only 2.9% of the time.

item.title: Jeff Bezos is reportedly courting Trump after public spat with Musk
item.description: Bezos allegedly sees an opening for his space company, Blue Origin, now that Musk has been diminished in the eyes of the President.

item.title: 10 Perks Prime Members Can Snag Before Prime Day (2025)
item.description: From free Audible trials to savings on food and fuel, these Prime-exclusive promotions are worth it.

item.title: Meta’s recruiting blitz claims three OpenAI researchers
item.description: In the fight for top AI talent, Meta just reportedly snagged a win, poaching three OpenAI researchers despite rival Sam Altman’s public mockery of Mar...
